interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Micellar Cleansing Water - Gentle Alcohol Free, No Rinse Facial Cleanser and Makeup Remover - For All Skin Types including Sensitive - Great for Travel, Post-Workout and Before Bedtime Review Date: 2016/08/24 Store: Bella Jade Product Description: ['Lazy girls of the world, party people, workaholics, brand new mommies and anyone who has anything better to do than taking FOREVER to take your makeup off – REJOICE because Micellar Water is here!', 'What’s micellar water, you ask? It’s a magical potion – a dream product for lazy girls or busy moms. Ever felt that you’re too tired to remove all your makeup and wash your face by the end of the day? Well, micellar water will be your best friend.', "Originally introduced in France over 100 years ago, where it was designed to help Parisians deal with the region's infamously harsh water supply, micellar cleansers have been their best kept secret ever since - that is, until make-up artists and models started raving about the benefits of this no-rinse formula, bringing it to our shores in recent years. It’s different from the usual facial wipes and cleansers you’re using. Facial wipes may help, but they don’t totally remove the dirt from your skin. And many cleansers can be too harsh and strip your skin. With micellar water, you only have to pour some on a cotton pad and wipe it on your skin – then voila — you’ve got a squeaky-clean face! Its magical formula makes removing makeup a breeze. It clings on the dirt and draws out impurities, leaving your skin glowing and hydrated. And if you’re a fan of double-cleansing, you can also use micellar water in the morning after washing your face."] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bella Jade', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '636655962860', 'Manufacturer': 'Bella Jade'} Review Text: This Pure Bliss Micellar Cleansing Water arrived in a plastic bag to assure that, if it did leak, it did not leak on other products, but it did not leak. It is a generous eight ounces, comes in a clear plastic bottle so you can tell when the product is getting low, and it comes with a handy flip-top lid that can be manipulated with one hand for ease of use. The scent of this is very light, if there is any at all. The label is tidy and contains the pertinent information, such as ingredients, Made in the USA, product information, and directions. The “Best by” date is clearly marked on the bottom of the bottle and is about a year out, giving me plenty of time to use the Micellar Cleansing Water.

Life is busy and there is always a lot to do, which is the perfect reason that I love this Micellar Cleansing Water. It’s great to use any time you want to wash your face, but my favorite use for it is when I come in from gardening or I have been busy working away at cleaning the house or whatever job I have been doing that may get me feeling a little grungy. I just put a dab of this on a cotton round and wash my face well with it, helping to make sure all that dirt isn’t left on my face too long and it works perfectly and is wonderfully refreshing. I love how easy this is to use, how quick it is to use, how well it works, and that it contains absolutely no harmful ingredients. I have not tried Micellar Cleansing Water before this. I’m very happy with this and am thankful I stumbled across it. I love it! Review Title: ~ Refreshing Grunge Fighter! ~ Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Luxury Conditioner With Aloe Vera - Hair Deep Conditioning for Dry Damaged Hair - Natural & Organic Moisturizing Hair Repair Treatment for Hair Loss Split Ends Dry & Itchy Scalp - Color Safe (8 oz) Organic Prestige {'Brand': 'Organic Prestige', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7.25 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '603404817160'} I have medium length naturally wavy, processed hair that tends to be frizzy if I don’t use good hair products, especially conditioner. After coming across this conditioner, it sounded perfect for my hair, so I decided to give it a try. The bottle itself is streamline and attractive, containing all of the pertinent information such as ingredients, directions, cautions, company information, and Made in the USA. I like that it is also paraben-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, organic, and vegan. The easy flip-top lid is very helpful in dispensing the conditioner and I am always happy when a product comes with a tamper-proof seal in place, as this did.

This conditioner is beautifully creamy, thick, and rich and smells wonderfully fresh and citrusy, uplifting and delicious, and is perfect for men and women. I have been washing my hair as usual, applying this conditioner and then using a wide-tooth comb to remove any tangles, after which I leave the conditioner on while I shave my legs and wash my body. This gives the conditioner a little extra time to do lovely things for my hair. I then gently pat my hair dry with my towel, apply a light Argan serum, and then let it air dry the rest of the way. I love how soft and smooth this conditioner makes my hair feel. ~ Softening and Smoothing with a Delicious Light True Citrus Scent. ~ Micellar Cleansing Water - Gentle Alcohol Free, No Rinse Facial Cleanser and Makeup Remover - For All Skin Types including Sensitive - Great for Travel, Post-Workout and Before Bedtime Bella Jade ['Lazy girls of the world, party people, workaholics, brand new mommies and anyone who has anything better to do than taking FOREVER to take your makeup off – REJOICE because Micellar Water is here!', 'What’s micellar water, you ask? It’s a magical potion – a dream product for lazy girls or busy moms. Ever felt that you’re too tired to remove all your makeup and wash your face by the end of the day? Its magical formula makes removing makeup a breeze. It clings on the dirt and draws out impurities, leaving your skin glowing and hydrated. And if you’re a fan of double-cleansing, you can also use micellar water in the morning after washing your face."] {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bella Jade', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 7 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '636655962860', 'Manufacturer': 'Bella Jade'} This Pure Bliss Micellar Cleansing Water arrived in a plastic bag to assure that, if it did leak, it did not leak on other products, but it did not leak. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Prefers high-quality hair care products specifically designed for dry and damaged hair.
- **Product Attributes:** Values natural, organic, paraben-free, sulfate-free, cruelty-free, and vegan formulations.
- **Application Method:** Enjoys a thorough application process and incorporates products seamlessly into personal care routines (e.g., shaving).
- **Scent Preference:** Prefers products with fresh and uplifting scents, with a specific inclination toward light fragrances.
- **Ease of Use:** Appreciates functional packaging, such as easy-to-use flip-top lids and tamper-proof seals.
- **User Experience:** Finds satisfaction in products that leave hair feeling soft, smooth, and manageable, often complementing them with additional treatments like serums. Recently, expressed appreciation for products that offer quick and refreshing cleansing solutions, particularly after physical activities.
- **Target Audience:** Values inclusive products suitable for all genders in hair care, extending a similar expectation to other personal care items.

Overall, this user prioritizes effective, ethically produced hair and personal care solutions that enhance overall health and hygiene experiences while integrating seamlessly into their fast-paced lifestyle. Adopting new products that offer convenience and high efficacy further demonstrates their commitment to quality and sustainability.
